__e: Surely you didn't expect to find anything wrong?
But a clue that's so vague... it's not much more use to us than no clue at all... unless you think there's something phony about this call... and somebody's planning to murder you.
But you thought he was in love with you.
Will you help him find a job?
Unless you can think of something what topples all the rest, we go home.
He only wishes you to think of him.

I don't want you to think I'm letting you down.

I don't want you to think I'm letting you down.

I don't want you to think I'm not trying to play ball.
